title: The Cig Riff - Christopher Mastropietro on Smoking, Contemplation and Time (Best 5m on the internet)
description:
Christopher beautifully evokes a spiritual truth of smoking that our worship of health eschews. Sometimes Dynamic Quality pushes biological through to enhance the intellectual. Sometimes the risk is worth it.

A great blog on this riff: https://www.lewrockwell.com/2020/05/ira-katz/the-best-5-minutes-on-the-internet/
